about_the_game:
VR driver school, designed specifically for the re conception and redesign of virtual reality. The game has just been launched and has become a driving school specific simulator software, perfectly restoring the driving school learning environment and making real-time judgments.

Supports two types of left and right rudders and related traffic rules around the world

Including two models: C1 manual and C2 automatic.

Supports two modes of VR joystick and steering wheel control

Complete set of subjects 2

: reverse parking, side parking, curve driving, right angle turning, designated parking on slopes, and driving practice and simulation exams for starting

Complete set of subjects

: starting, shifting, right turn, left turn, lane changing, turning, overtaking, meeting, pulling over, passing public transportation, school, sidewalk, and mock exams

Super realistic venue simulation! Real time simulation exams, non-invasive virtual environments, don't worry about hitting anything, go ahead and take it!
detailed_description:
VR driver school, designed specifically for the re conception and redesign of virtual reality. The game has just been launched and has become a driving school specific simulator software, perfectly restoring the driving school learning environment and making real-time judgments.

Supports two types of left and right rudders and related traffic rules around the world

Including two models: C1 manual and C2 automatic.

Supports two modes of VR joystick and steering wheel control

Complete set of subjects 2

: reverse parking, side parking, curve driving, right angle turning, designated parking on slopes, and driving practice and simulation exams for starting

Complete set of subjects

: starting, shifting, right turn, left turn, lane changing, turning, overtaking, meeting, pulling over, passing public transportation, school, sidewalk, and mock exams

Super realistic venue simulation! Real time simulation exams, non-invasive virtual environments, don't worry about hitting anything, go ahead and take it!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux + SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • VR Support: SteamVR
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux + SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 equivalent
  • VR Support: SteamVR

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 equivalent

name: VR Driver School

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32/64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (32/64-BIT)
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 980 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required
  • Additional Notes: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer

reviews:
“It should be the most practical game in VR, which can help me learn how to drive. I hope the game becomes better and better .”
5 – colin

“Es ist wirklich eine ausgewiesene Simulationsunterricht-Software für Fahrschulen. Wie beim Fahrschulprojekt”
5 – mashko

“这个练车软件还不错，每天练一练，配合在驾校真车，车技上升很快，推荐给大家”
5 – wastatoo
short_description: VR driver school, designed specifically for the re conception and redesign of virtual reality. The game has just been launched and has become a driving school specific simulator software, perfectly restoring the driving school learning environment and making real-time judgments.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Spain
